page.title: 15THE LIBRARY IN BROMYARD
page.content: {Bromyard Library}opened in 1972 in the old police building. Today there are two members of staff, and the chief librarian is{Mrs.Teal. In 1985, the total book stock is {13,307.}The new books chosen are from {Malvern Library. The library is financed by rates, fines and book sales. It is open Tuesdays, Thursdays, Fridays and Saturdays. The most popular books are biographies, fiction and country books. Books and tapes for the {blind and partially sighted}are available. There is a local history room and children's activities are provided. The library supplies information on jobs, tourism, travel and local societies. The housebound can also obtain information from the library.
